name: Execute Workflow Trigger
semantic_context: Helpers for calling other n8n workflows. Used for designing modular, microservice-like workflows.
natural_language_description: 这是 Execute Workflow Trigger 节点。主要用于: Helpers for calling other n8n workflows. Used for designing modular, microservice-like workflows.

events.name: events
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events | 默认值: worklfow_call
available_options: Workflow Call (值: worklfow_call) - When executed by another workflow using Execute Workflow Trigger

notice.displayName: When an ‘execute workflow’ node calls this workflow, the execution starts here. Any data passed into the 'execute workflow' node will be output by this node.
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: When an ‘execute workflow’ node calls this workflow, the execution starts here. Any data passed into the 'execute workflow' node will be output by this node.

outdatedVersionWarning.displayName: This node is out of date. Please upgrade by removing it and adding a new one
outdatedVersionWarning.name: outdatedVersionWarning
outdatedVersionWarning.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node is out of date. Please upgrade by removing it and adding a new one

inputSource.name: inputSource
inputSource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input data mode | 默认值: workflowInputs
available_options: Define using fields below (值: workflowInputs) - Provide input fields via UI
Define using JSON example (值: jsonExample) - Generate a schema from an example JSON object
Accept all data (值: passthrough) - Use all incoming data from the parent workflow

jsonExample_notice.displayName:
Provide an example object to infer fields and their types.
To allow any type for a given field, set the value to null.
jsonExample_notice.name: jsonExample_notice
jsonExample_notice.natural_language_description:
参数名: Provide an example object to infer fields and their types.
To allow any type for a given field, set the value to null.

jsonExample.name: jsonExample

workflowInputs.name: workflowInputs
workflowInputs.description: Define expected input fields. If no inputs are provided, all data from the calling workflow will be passed through.
workflowInputs.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workflow Input Schema | 作用: Define expected input fields. If no inputs are provided, all data from the calling workflow will be passed through. | 默认值: {}
